markdown:
**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact ([electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56))
 **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You shoot an arrow at the sky and it tears an extraplanar rift that resembles a storm cloud in a 30-foot burst centered on a point within 200 feet. A torrent of rain pours down from the rift for 1 minute or until you Dismiss the effect. The area within the torrent becomes difficult terrain for all movement (including [Flying](/Actions.aspx?ID=94)). As an Interact action, you can fire an arrow into the rift to cause a bolt of lightning to strike a creature in the area. The creature takes 5d12 lightning damage and must attempt a DC 41 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save.
name: command, Interact (electricity)
